title: (x) Type ID - "Greenberg" Film Titles - Soolidium {self (Ryan Thompson)}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107123741im_/http:/typophile.com/files/75441d049a0fdac8c9810e884be0f5b7_4754.35645.jpg)

any thoughts? I've got nothing. It's definitely unrefined. I doubt anyone went to the trouble of designing a typeface for this movie however.

The lowercase l and c would give it away.

It's Soolidium!  
 [http://www.dafont.com/soolidium.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107123741/http:/www.dafont.com/soolidium.font "http://www.dafont.com/soolidium.font")
author: thompson

comments.content:
Hi Ryan,  
see this thread: [Squarish sans in Greenberg movie trailer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107123741/http:/typophile.com/node/65866).  
F

Yuck. Looks like a fan of [Antenna](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107123741/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/antenna_black/?&sample_text=jennifer%20jason%20leigh&update=0) had some fun in TypeTool.
